Room.Name: Alturis Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Alturis Road, between Charybdis Way and Ivory Way.
Room.LongDescription: There is a research park on the north side of the road, and the famous Hanging Gardens on the south side. The city of Kista seems to be a mix of of wonderful grand scale art and the latest in science. Kista was built by the three major races in Mordor as a place for all knowledge.
